channel.title: deviceowners on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in deviceowners on SoftLayer API

item.title: DeviceOwners.rb
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' user = "" api_key = "apikey_goes_here" billing = SoftLayer::Service.new("SoftLayer_Account",:username => user,:api_key => api_key) object_mask = "mask[fullyQualifiedDomainName,billingItem[categoryCode,description,createDate,orderItem[order[userRecord[username]]]]]" hardware_list = billing.object_mask(object_mask).getHardware virtual_guest_list = billing.object_mask(object_mask).getVirtualGuests def describe(item) domain_name = nil; category_code = nil; description = nil; create_date = nil; user_name = nil; begin domain_name = item["fullyQualifiedDomainName"] category_code = item["billingItem"]["categoryCode"] description = item["billingItem"]["description"] create_date = item["billingItem"]["createDate"] user_name = item["billingItem"]["orderItem"]["order"]["userRecord"]["username"] rescue => ex puts ex.message end return "'" + (domain_name ? domain_name : " no fullyQualifiedDomainName " ) + "'" + " category code: " + "'" + (category_code ?
